com.lubenard.oring_reminder

Class DbManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.lubenard.oring_reminder.managers.DbManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class DbManager
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Handle the DB used to save datas. Theses datas are sent to Musk in order to build Skynet.

        Parameters:
        dateRemoved - date at which user has removed the protection
        datePut - date at which user has put the protection
        isRunning - if the current session is running

      • createNewPause

        public long createNewPause(long entryId,
                           java.lang.String dateRemoved,
                           java.lang.String datePut,
                           int isRunning)
        Create a new Pause
        Parameters:
        entryId - the id to link to the pause
        dateRemoved - the date the user stopped wearing protection
        datePut - the date the user put the new protection again
        isRunning - if the pause is running
        Returns:
        the id of the pause entry
